title: Alpha Mate
description: Alpha Mate, the second book in the Pack Rules series  Campbell will do anything to protect his friends. He's a Chippewa Indian living in the land of the white man, so he is used to adversity and needing to rely on himself to protect those dearest to him. James is the strong, powerful alpha of the Rue pack of wolves. He craves a strong, capable, loving mate. When he sees Campbell in action he cannot wait to claim the man and make Campbell his. To get to their happily ever after they must face walls of distrust and fear. Can Campbell accept the love right in front of him or will he continue to fight his feelings?
author: B.A. Stretke
